subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] EVP-Radio Crime Recording Video
author: Misty Dawn
full_text:
Hi Mike E

There are alot of tools to use to sync your audio and video files. Just do a search in google for "sync audio video" and you will bring up a jillion sites offering advice. Heres one off the top that has some software to use

http://www.gromkov.com/faq/faq2004-0064.html

Misty




--- On Sat, 12/6/08, Michael E <f1cracker75@...> wrote:

> From: Michael E <f1cracker75@...>
> Subject: [EVP-ITC] EVP-Radio Crime Recording Video
> To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
> Date: Saturday, December 6, 2008, 6:52 PM
> Hi everyone, I have recorded a video of my EVP-Radio Crime
> recording 
> process, where I get leads from deceased victims and hand
> over to law 
> enforcement or missing person advocates to run the leads.
> 
> http://uk.youtube.com/watch?v=WhGKXBp6Lg0
> 
> I went out to Mike Colletta's site to see if there was
> any guidance, 
> but none on how to sync up my voice in the video.
> 
> I used a web cam to do the recording.
> 
> Does anyone know how to do this?
> 
> Mike Edwards
